name: Never Back Down
description: NEVER BACK DOWN [NBD] is a meme utility token created on Binance smartchain , NBD goal is to provide services in the digital space, on a global scale, so that as many people as possible can use and benefit from it. The NBD ecosystem connects three technology platforms that we develop ourselves: the Galilei, hybrid crypto-exchange, the Everchain, encrypted data storage and the NBD Future, global real estate online platform, which takes an advantage of blockchain technologies, linked with our digital currency NBD. NBD has a Buyback and burn programs result in increased liquidity as secondary market demand is always higher this results in lower price volatility for the token.
